11.title: Semi-Automated Support Center

12.title: Fraud Detection
12.description: Identify and prevent suspicious behavior with AI-powered monitoring of access patterns, payment anomalies, and device tampering attempts.

header.description: The first fully AI-powered parking intelligence ecosystem. Modernize operations, pricing, displays, booking, and more — from one platform.

vision.title: Reengineering the Parking Industry
vision.description: A new generation has built the intelligent infrastructure that unifies data, operations, pricing, displays, booking, automation, and AI — into one cohesive ecosystem.

revenueGrowth.title: +35%|Revenue Growth
revenueGrowth.description: Average revenue uplift with AI-driven dynamic pricing

multiSiteScale.title: ∞|Multi-Site Scale
multiSiteScale.description: Unified control across unlimited parking locations

problem.title: Parking has been frozen for 20 years.
problem.description: Most operators still rely on outdated systems, fragmented data, manual processes, and static pricing. Nothing communicates together. The industry stayed profitable despite inefficiency — which is exactly why innovation stalled.

noVisibility.title: No Real-Time Visibility
noVisibility.description: Operators can't see what's happening across their parking assets in real time.

staticPricing.title: Static Pricing
staticPricing.description: Revenue is left on the table with fixed pricing that ignores demand signals.

fragmentedSystems.title: Fragmented Systems
fragmentedSystems.description: Hardware, software, and data live in disconnected silos with no integration.

ai.title: The first AI model
ai.description: We are pioneers in artificial intelligence applied to parking. Our models — trained on over 2 years of real-world parking data — learn the unique behavior of each facility to predict and optimize in real time.

forecasting.title: Forecasting AI
forecasting.description: The first artificial intelligence model designed to predict all parking data — occupancy, revenue, traffic, demand — with unmatched accuracy.

dynamicPricing.title: Dynamic Pricing AI
dynamicPricing.description: Real-time price calculation and adjustment based on the simultaneous analysis of dozens of variables. Zero manual intervention, immediate results.

conversational.title: Conversational AI Agent
conversational.description: Talk to your parking. Ask questions, get recommendations, and receive actionable insights — all through a natural language interface powered by AI.

ai.dataSourcesDescription: Our AI continuously ingests and cross-references dozens of data sources to generate optimal forecasts and pricing.

traffic.title: Traffic Data
traffic.description: Google Maps data, congestion, route patterns

ticketing.title: Ticketing & Buildings
ticketing.description: Traffic from nearby platforms and venues

ai.resultTitle: Higher Revenue. Higher Occupancy. Higher Efficiency.
ai.resultDescription: Automatic and continuous optimization — with zero human intervention.

process.title: The Best Hardware to Fit with
process.description: Parkwize partners with Process Technology to deliver a fully integrated hardware-software stack — barriers, terminals, sensors, and access systems designed for the intelligent parking era.

industrialGrade.title: Industrial Grade
industrialGrade.description: Built for 24/7 outdoor operation in any climate

smartIntegration.title: Smart Integration
smartIntegration.description: Natively connected to the Parkwize software ecosystem

realTimeSync.title: Real-Time Sync
realTimeSync.description: Hardware state synced live with our Analytics Dashboard

section03.title03:
System is Designed to
Maximize Your Parking Revenue
section03.description: Our proprietary PRO System helps parking operators unlock hidden revenue, improve space usage, and make smarter decisions based on real-time data. Here's how we turn your parking data into a predictable performance engine:

cards.title: PLAN Your Parking Intelligence Foundation
cards.description: We lay the groundwork through deep discovery and strategic mapping:
features: Complete audit of your current parking usage data
Identification of underutilized zones and revenue gaps
Analysis of seasonal trends, user behavior, and pricing models
Setup of your Parking Optimization Roadmap for the next 60 days

cards.title: REFINE Your Data Engine
cards.description: We structure your analytics and tracking systems to unlock full performance:
features: Real-time space tracking and heatmaps by time of day
Custom reporting dashboards aligned with business goals
Smart alerts for overcapacity, bottlenecks, and low-turnover zones
Weekly reports showing gains in occupancy and revenue

cards.title: OPTIMIZE for Maximum Yield
cards.description: We fine-tune the system to maximize every available space:
features: Dynamic pricing recommendations based on demand
Automated adjustment suggestions based on usage patterns
Strategic scenario planning (events, weather, holidays, etc.)

section05.tag: Stay focused on what truly matters
section05.title: We Handle Every Aspect of Your Parking Analytics
section05.description: Stop wasting time with manual tracking and guesswork. The Parkwize platform gives you instant access to real-time data, automated insights, and performance dashboards — a complete solution built to increase occupancy, streamline operations, and drive more revenue from your parking assets.

features.title: Real-Time Occupancy Tracking
features.description: Monitor space usage live to identify high-traffic zones and idle capacity.

features.title: Smart Space Segmentation
features.description: Categorize and analyse parking zones by user type, duration, or profitability.

features.title: Automated Alerts & Notifications
features.description: Get instant alerts for overcapacity, long stays, or unusual patterns.

features.title: Dynamic Pricing Suggestions
features.description: Use demand-driven insights to optimize pricing across zones and time slots.

features.title: Performance Dashboards
features.description: Visualize revenue, turnover rate, and space efficiency in a single click.

features.title: Seamless Integration Support
features.description: Connect Parkwize with your access control, ticketing, or payment systems effortlessly.

faq.question: What's included in your parking analytics platform?
faq.answer: Access to real-time dashboards, space usage heatmaps, dynamic pricing tools, automated alerts, and integration options.

faq.question: How does the optimization process work?
faq.answer: We begin with a full audit of your parking data, then implement real-time tracking, identify inefficiencies, and provide actionable insights within 30 days.

faq.question: How quickly can we get started?
faq.answer: Setup takes less than 10 days for most parking facilities (depending on the selected package). Our team handles onboarding, data sync, training, and more.

faq.question: Do I need to use specific hardware or systems?
faq.answer: No. Parkwize integrates with most major access control, payment, and ticketing systems — but we highly recommend matching our solutions with Process technology and hardware.

faq.question: What kind of ROI can I expect?
faq.answer: Most clients see a 15–40% revenue increase from space optimization and better turnover. We back it with transparent performance tracking.

faq.question: How do you measure success?
faq.answer: We track key metrics like revenue per space, occupancy rate, average duration, and underutilization — all visualized in your dashboard.

section08.title: Ready to Optimize Your Parking Using Powerful Solutions and Data-Driven Ecosystem?
section08.description01: Join the growing number of operators and property managers using Parkwize to maximize revenue and efficiency with real-time parking analytics. No more guesswork. No more underused spaces. Just data-backed decisions that drive consistent returns month after month.
section08.description02: Don’t let another day of missed revenue go unnoticed. Schedule your Parking Optimization Call today.

header.title: Offer your customers a modern, simple, and fast experience to book their parking online, under your own brand
header.description: Our solution allows you to digitize and monetize your parking spaces with a custom platform, tailored to your image. It integrates perfectly with your website or a dedicated page, with your logo, colors, conditions, and features.

section01.title: We Build, Deploy, and Manage Your Complete Reservation Platform
section01.description: From custom design to ongoing support, we handle all aspects of your online reservation system. You focus on your business while we ensure your platform runs perfectly and generates maximum revenue.
section01.subtitle: Main Features

functionalities.title: 24/7 Online Booking
functionalities.details: Your customers can book their parking space at any time, from their phone or computer.

functionalities.title: Customized Interface to Your Brand
functionalities.details: A platform entirely tailored to your brand, aligned with your branding – logo, colors, texts, messages, etc.

functionalities.title: Multiple Ticket Types and Features
functionalities.details: Offer flexibility: hourly, daily, monthly parking, multi-entry access, and much more.

functionalities.title: Integrated and Secure Payment
functionalities.details: Instant card payment with automatic invoicing. Integration possible with Stripe, Square, Moneris, and more.

functionalities.title: Management Dashboard
functionalities.details: View real-time reservations, manage access, and export your accounting reports or connect directly to your QuickBooks.

section02.title: Smart and Secure Access
section02.description: After each reservation, the user automatically receives access instructions, including two technological options:

section05.title: Our Custom Online Reservation Platform Is Built for Maximum Conversions
section05.description: Our reservation system combines user-friendly design with powerful backend features to create seamless booking experiences that drive customer satisfaction and increase your revenue.

steps.title: DESIGN Your Custom Booking Experience
steps.description: We create a tailored reservation interface that matches your brand and customer needs:
list: Custom UI/UX design aligned with your brand
Mobile-first responsive design approach
User journey optimization for maximum conversions
Integration with your existing website and systems

steps.title: DEVELOP Core Booking Features
steps.description: We build and integrate all essential reservation functionality:
list: Real-time availability and booking engine
Secure payment processing and PCI compliance
Customer account management and profiles
Automated email and SMS notifications

steps.title: DEPLOY & Optimize Performance
steps.description: We launch your platform and continuously optimize for better results:
list: Cloud deployment with auto-scaling infrastructure
Performance monitoring and optimization
A/B testing for conversion improvements
Ongoing feature updates and support

oldWay.title: Most Parking Operators Still Rely on Phone Calls and Walk-Ins, Missing Out on Revenue...
list: Customers can't book in advance, leading to uncertainty
Staff time wasted on phone bookings and manual processes
No payment guarantee leading to no-shows and lost revenue
Limited operating hours restricting booking opportunities

parkwizeWay.title: Transform Your Parking Business with a Modern Online Reservation Platform...
list: 24/7 online booking with instant confirmation
Automated payment processing and guaranteed revenue
Smart pricing that adapts to demand and maximizes revenue
Complete customer management and loyalty programs

section07.title: We Build, Deploy, and Manage Your Entire Reservation Platform
section07.description: From custom design to ongoing support, we handle every aspect of your online reservation system. You focus on your business while we ensure your platform runs smoothly and generates maximum revenue.

solutions.title: 24/7 Online Booking
solutions.description: Your customers can book their parking space at any time, from their phone or computer.

solutions.title: Customized Interface to Your Brand
solutions.description: A platform entirely tailored to your brand, aligned with your branding – logo, colors, texts, messages, etc.

solutions.title: Multiple Ticket Types and Features
solutions.description: Offer flexibility: hourly, daily, monthly parking, multi-entry access, and much more.

reasons.description: AI-powered pricing optimization for maximum revenue
Complete account management and loyalty features
Automated SMS and email communication system
Real-time booking and revenue analytics dashboard

questions.question: How quickly can customers make a reservation?
questions.answer: Our streamlined booking process allows customers to complete a reservation in under 30 seconds, with real-time availability and instant confirmation.

questions.question: What payment methods do you support?
questions.answer: We support all major credit cards, digital wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay), and can integrate with your existing payment processors.

questions.question: Can customers modify or cancel their reservations?
questions.answer: Yes, customers can easily modify or cancel reservations through their account portal, with automated refund processing based on your cancellation policies.

questions.question: How does dynamic pricing work?
questions.answer: Our system automatically adjusts pricing based on demand, time of day, events, and other factors you define, helping maximize revenue during peak periods.

questions.question: Do you provide customer support features?
questions.description: Yes, we include built-in customer support tools, automated help desk integration, and 24/7 technical support for your reservation platform.

questions.question: Can the system handle high-volume bookings?
questions.description: Absolutely. Our cloud infrastructure scales automatically to handle thousands of concurrent bookings, ensuring smooth operation during peak demand.

section10.title: Ready to Launch Your Custom Online Reservation Platform?
section10.description1: Join the growing number of parking operators who've transformed their business with our custom reservation platforms. From design to deployment, we handle everything so you can start generating more revenue from day one.
section10.description2: Don't let another customer drive away because they couldn't book in advance. Get your reservation platform today.
